tool_description: Manages and configures stock alert thresholds for products, categories, and warehouses with rule-based automation and threshold optimization.

entity_type.description: Type of entity to manage: product, category, warehouse

entity_id.description: Specific entity ID to configure thresholds for

auto_optimize.description: Automatically optimize thresholds based on demand patterns

error_messages: Invalid entity type: Use one of [product, category, warehouse].
Entity not found: The specified entity ID does not exist.
Invalid threshold values: Critical threshold must be less than low stock threshold.
Threshold optimization failed: Insufficient data for automatic optimization.
Permission denied: User lacks permission to modify thresholds for this entity.
usage: Specify entity_type and entity_id to target threshold configuration. Set low_stock_threshold and critical_stock_threshold values. Enable auto_optimize for system-suggested thresholds based on historical patterns.
